title: Average regular season home attendance of the Chicago Bears 2008 to 2019
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Average attendance. In total the number of data points it has is 12.
Overall Average attendance has decreased over the Year.
Average attendance is roughly constant from 2008 to 2013, gradually decreasing from 2013 to 2016, slightly increasing from 2016 to 2018, and lastly roughly constant from 2018 to 2019.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
The highest Average attendance, of value 62358.0 was reached at Year 2013
Minimum Average attendance about 60368.0 was reached at Year 2016
